thread.section_title: POP Yachts Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of POP Yachts | popyachts.com
thread.title: KEITH

author: KEITH
title: KEITH
text: The broker/agent, Dave Yorke was very helpful and informative. He is very knowledgeable and really communicative on all aspects of the purchase including product advice and details of the fund transfer, closing, etc. Nicole Olsen, the assigned closing agent, was extra communicative keeping me totally informed at all phases of the transaction. Both Dave and Nicole were especially prompt. Both handled discussions with the seller and kept the deal on track. I have a friend who has observed "they say we live in a service economy, but just try getting some." I'm a retired sales person. I always strived to offer the type service I received from POP Yachts. POP Yachts has got customer service down cold.
